Uses of Class
java.nio.charset.CharsetEncoder

Packages that use CharsetEncoder
Package
Description
java.io
Provides for system input and output through data streams, serialization and the file system.
java.nio.channels
Defines channels, which represent connections to entities that are capable of performing I/O operations, such as files and sockets; defines selectors, for multiplexed, non-blocking I/O operations.
java.nio.charset
Defines charsets, decoders, and encoders, for translating between bytes and Unicode characters.

  • Uses of CharsetEncoder in java.io

    Modifier
    Constructor
    Description
     
    OutputStreamWriter(OutputStream out, CharsetEncoder enc)
    Creates an OutputStreamWriter that uses the given charset encoder.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static Writer
    Channels.newWriter(WritableByteChannel ch, CharsetEncoder enc, int minBufferCap)
    Constructs a writer that encodes characters using the given encoder and writes the resulting bytes to the given channel.

    Method
    Description

    Resets this encoder, clearing any internal state.
